name: minimal-node-js
description: Minimal Node.js sample demonstrating Dev Proxy usage with Node.js 24 built-in proxy support

scripts.start: concurrently -n proxy,app -c magenta,cyan "devproxy" "sleep 2 && NODE_USE_ENV_PROXY=1 HTTP_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:8000 HTTPS_PROXY=http://127.0.0.1:8000 node --use-system-ca app.js"
